outer
peekOfCode:
def outer():
    x='outer x' # when we comment this got error             
    def inner():
        nonlocal x #  nonlocal working as global variable
        x='inner x' # when we comment this got outer X ans
        print(x)
    inner()
    print(x)
outer()

    return lism
